title: England to face Australia, NZ, Argentina next year
text:
Rugby Union - Rugby World Cup warm-up match - England v Italy - St James' Park, Newcastle, Britain - September 6, 2019 England players team huddle at half time Action Images via Reuters/Ed Sykes/Files

OITA, Japan (Reuters) - A day before they are due to face Australia in a Rugby World Cup quarter-final, England have announced they will play the Wallabies again in one of four 2020 November internationals at Twickenham.

England will open up against New Zealand on Nov. 7 and face Argentina, who they beat in the World Cup pool stage in Japan, a week later.

The third match will be against a Tier 2 nation, who are yet to be confirmed, before they sign off against Australia on Nov. 28.
description: A day before they are due to face Australia in a Rugby World Cup quarter-final, England have announced they will play the Wallabies again in one of four 2020 November internationals at Twickenham.
